turns.utterance: Can you tell me when my train departs and if there are any luggage storage options?

turns.utterance: Your train departs at 3:45 PM. For luggage, we have storage lockers available at the station and onboard storage options depending on the type of ticket you have. Which would you prefer?

turns.speaker: SYSTEM
turns.utterance: The onboard storage does not cost extra. It's included with your ticket type. Is there anything else you need help with?

turns.utterance: No, that's all I needed to know. Thank you for your help!

turns.utterance: You're welcome! If you have any more questions or need assistance in the future, feel free to ask. Have a great trip!
